title: Battlecast Prime Cho'gath fanart
body:
uhh I did it

Cho'gath is the first dude I got and the first dude I bought a skin for.
I still play him today.
He is my favourite thing in the known universe so I drew him.
Hope y'all like
feedback and whatnots is super okay
it's 6am drawing is hard
{{summoner:3}} 

if anyone wants me to draw more then im flattered

**Edit**
Forgot I have a deviantart: http://dony123.deviantart.com/

replies.body: maybe some Jurassic Cho'gath for the fans

sorry for the late response, thought this was dead, happened to revisit just by chance
i've been needing something to draw again anyways; it's been so long
What about {{champion:112}} ?? He is one good looking champion
I agree, he has one of my favourite designs as well. More specifically the Battlecast version :P
Your art style is cool. and I love some cho
